thread.title: Denzel Washington is checking into 'Grey's'

title: Denzel Washington is checking into 'Grey's'
text:
Denzel Washington will direct an episode of 'Grey's Anatomy' during Season 12. (Photo: Andy Kropa, Andy Kropa /Invision/AP)
8 CONNECT 11 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE Dr. Grey will see Denzel Washington now.
The Oscar-winning movie star has signed on to direct an episode of Grey's Anatomy during Season 12, according to TV Line and Variety .
Washington will helm this season's ninth episode, reports TV Line , scheduled to start shooting later this month.
The outlook? Pretty good: Washington's well versed in directing, having previously helmed 2002's Antwone Fisher and 2007's The Great Debaters .
And he's no stranger to Shondaland, having stopped by How to Get Away with Murder's table read last year.
Guess who came to dinner! #HTGAWM @HowToGetAwayABC pic.twitter.com/ioZyqGE2Kq
â€” Viola Davis (@violadavis) October 6, 2014 Of course, some fans wanted more.
I thought Denzel Washington was gonna be on Greys and I screamed, dammit just directing ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚
â€” Tuliyana. (@Tuliyana) October 13, 2015 He's got more big plans for TV. Washington recently announced he will produce 10 of Pulitzer prize-winning playwright August Wilson's works in a deal with HBO.
"I'm directing and producing and acting in one ( Fences ) and I'm executive producing the other nine," Washington shared at an event in September, according to The Hollywood Reporter .
